languageKey.label: Enabled: Shall the optimization of the source be enabled for this template
Enable UTF-8 support: Disable if your website doesn't use UTF-8 and you have a problem with empty strings
Remove generator: Remove <meta name="generator" content="Typo 6.2 CMS">
Remove blur-script: Removes the script in the head that defines the blur-function and also removes the "onFocus="blurLink(this);"" of tags; May cause problems if you work with JS
Remove HTML-Comments
Spare this comments from remove: Regular expressions that match comments that should not be removed. Very useful e.g. to keep the TYPO3SEARCH-Comments so indexed_search can work properly

Format HTML: Formats the code beautiful and easy readable. New lines and tabs are used in the usual way of illustrating the structure of an XML code. This is a great help for developing and checking the code (Option 4 or 5) as well as compressing the code that it is faster transferred to the user agent (Option 1 or 2).
Off
No line break at all (code in one line)
Minimalistic line breaks (structure defining box-elements)
Aesthetic line breaks (important box-elements)
Logic line breaks (all box-elements)
Formatting Tab-Size: Spezify number of blank-space for formatting. If empty a tab will be used.
Show debugging comment: A comment at the end of the html code that points out the number of open html tags.
